original_text: But then the baby moved his hand back inside and his brother came out first. The woman said, ‘You have opened a way for yourself to come out!’ So they gave him the name ‘Perez’.
korean_text: 그 손을 도로 들이며 그의 아우가 나오는지라 산파가 이르되 네가 어찌하여 터뜨리고 나오느냐 하였으므로 그 이름을 베레스라 불렀고

sentences.original_text: But then the baby moved his hand back inside
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 아기는 손을 안으로 다시 움직였고

sentences.original_text: and his brother came out first
'You have opened a way for yourself to come out!'
So they gave him the name 'Perez'
